## date_breaks Regularly spaced dates.

#### Description
Regularly spaced dates.

#### Usage
<pre><code>
date_breaks(width = "1 month")
</code></pre>

#### Arguments
* width an interval specification, one of "sec", "min", "hour", "day", "week", "month",
"year". Can be by an integer and a space, or followed by "s". Fractional seconds
are supported.
